note: The Delta Review magazine was founded by the Self family in Marks, Mississippi in 1963. It was based in Greenville until around 1968 or so, when it relocated to Memphis and stopped publishing in 1969. In 2019, The Delta Review relaunched online as a Southeastern culture and lifestyle blog. Blues, jazz, coffee, travel, restaurants, art and folklore of the region are our reason for being. Visit https://thedeltareview.com/ and follow us here as well.
